channel.title: ESP32 on Toniebox Hacking
channel.description: Recent content in ESP32 on Toniebox Hacking

item.title: Pinout
item.description: Pin ID Pin Name Toniebox usage Target Notes 01 LNA_IN 02 VDD3P3 03 VDD3P3 04 CHIP_PU 05 GPIO0 Boot J100 06 GPIO1 SS TRF7962A 07 GPIO2 MOSI TRF7962A 08 GPIO3 MISO TRF7962A 09 GPIO4 SCLK TRF7962A 10 GPIO5 I2C_SDA LIS + DAC 11 GPIO6 I2C_SCL LIS + DAC 12 GPIO7 button pressed or charger present wake up (1=no button/no charger) 13 GPIO8 ADC_charg R75/R72, 100k立/100k立 divider (div 2) U300 LM3485, 5V buck, charger 14 GPIO9 ADC_Vbatt R57/R58, 100k立/33k立 divider (div 4) right before U320 “BW93” boost?
